  • Classes in bftsmart.tom.server used by bftsmart.clientsmanagement 
    Class Description
    RequestVerifier
    Classes that implement this interface are invoked within das instances upon reception of a PROPOSE message in order to enforce the "external validity".
  • Classes in bftsmart.tom.server used by bftsmart.statemanagement.strategy.durability 
    Class Description
    Recoverable
    Classes that implement this interface should implement a state transfer protocol.
  • Classes in bftsmart.tom.server used by bftsmart.tom 
    Class Description
    Executable
    Executables that implement this interface can received unordered client requests.
    Recoverable
    Classes that implement this interface should implement a state transfer protocol.
    Replier
    Provides support for building custom reply management to be used in the ServiceReplica.
    RequestVerifier
    Classes that implement this interface are invoked within das instances upon reception of a PROPOSE message in order to enforce the "external validity".

  • Classes in bftsmart.tom.server used by bftsmart.tom.server 
    Class Description
    Executable
    Executables that implement this interface can received unordered client requests.
    SingleExecutable
    Executables that implement this interface will receive client requests individually.
  • Classes in bftsmart.tom.server used by bftsmart.tom.server.defaultservices 
    Class Description
    BatchExecutable
    Executables that implement this interface will receive a batch of requests and deliver them to the application in a deterministic way.
    Executable
    Executables that implement this interface can received unordered client requests.
    Recoverable
    Classes that implement this interface should implement a state transfer protocol.
    Replier
